mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SCHEDULE_NO, MEMBER_NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, TITLE, BACK_COLOR, ALL_DAY, TYPE, STATUS) VALUES(#{scheduleNo}, #{memberNo}, #{departmentNo}, #{content}, to_timestamp(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{title}, #{backColor}, #{allDay}, #{type}, default)
mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_NO, MEMBER_NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, TITLE, BACK_COLOR, ALL_DAY, TYPE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET CONTENT=#{content}, TITLE=#{title}, BACK_COLOR=#{backColor}, ALL_DAY=#{allDay}, TYPE=#{type}, START_DATE=to_timestamp(#{startDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), END_DATE=to_timestamp(#{endDate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE SCHEDULE_NO=#{scheduleNo}
